text: Jennifer Lopez has been the subject of rumours that her boyfriend Alex Rodriguez is getting ready to propose. And in an interview with Stellar magazine on Saturday, the 49 - year - old added more fuel to the fire, although she claims the pair'butt heads '. Speaking of their future together, the singer said of the baseball player :'It's nice to hit your stride with somebody who can keep up with you. The sky's the limit, I think.'Scroll down for video'We're set in our ways': Jennifer Lopez ( left ) says she and boyfriend Alex Rodriguez ( right )'butt heads'but continues to fuel engagement speculation The actress added :'We love and support each other as much as we can, and we understand how important those things are because we are older now.'However
